scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Widget-Title}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript: #set($hasMessage = false) #if ($context.Status.SystemStatus == 'Critical') #set($overLicense = '') #set($expiredLicense = '') #set($hasMultipleOver = false) #set($hasMultipleExpired = false) #foreach($pu in $context.Status.ProductUsage) #foreach($u in $pu.Usages) #if ($u.IsOver) #if ($overLicense.Length == 0) #set($overLicense = "${pu.Name}: ${u.Name}") #else #set($overLicense = "${overLicense}, ${pu.Name}: ${u.Name}") #set($hasMultipleOver = true) #end #end #end #if ($pu.ExpiresDate && $core_v2_utility.CompareDates($pu.ExpiresDate, 'EarlierThan', $core_v2_utility.CurrentDate)) #if ($expiredLicense.Length == 0) #set($expiredLicense = "${pu.Name}") #else #set($expiredLicense = "${expiredLicense}, ${pu.Name}") #set($hasMultipleExpired = true) #end #end #end #if ($expiredLicense.Length > 0 || $overLicense.Length > 0) #if ($expiredLicense.Length > 0) #if ($hasMultipleExpired) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Critical_Expired_Multiple'), $expiredLicense) #else $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Critical_Expired'), $expiredLicense) #end #end #if ($overLicense.Length > 0) #if ($hasMultipleOver) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Critical_Over_Multiple'), $overLicense) #else $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Critical_Over'), $overLicense) #end #end #set($hasMessage = true) #end #elseif ($context.Status.SystemStatus == 'Warning') #set($expiringLicense = '') #set($checkDate = $core_v2_utility.CurrentDate.AddDays(7)) #set($hasMultiple = false) #foreach($pu in $context.Status.ProductUsage) #if ($pu.ExpiresDate && $core_v2_utility.CompareDates($pu.ExpiresDate, 'EarlierThan', $checkDate)) #if ($expiringLicense.Length == 0) #set($expiringLicense = "${pu.Name}") #else #set($expiringLicense = "$expiringLicense, ${pu.Name}") #set($hasMultiple = true) #end #end #end #if ($expiringLicense.Length > 0) #if ($hasMultiple) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Warning_Multiple'), $expiringLicense) #else $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Warning'), $expiringLicense) #end #set($hasMessage = true) #end #end #if (!$hasMessage) $core_v2_language.GetResource('Normal') #end
